abstract: Debit card transactions were once free, but that is no longer always the case. Overdraft charges are one more thing to keep in mind when using your card.
snippet: Debit card transactions were once free, but that is no longer always the case. Overdraft charges are one more thing to keep in mind when using your card.
lead_paragraph: R. C. Welborn, a college student and part-time contractor in Pensacola, Fla., has learned a hard and costly lesson about debit cards. He said he got his first clue about potential pitfalls involving overdraft fees a year ago.

headline.main: Does That Pack of Gum Need to Go on a Debit Card?
headline.print_headline: Does That Pack of Gum Need to Go on a Debit Card?
